tool_description: Analyzes content attributes and characteristics to predict viral potential and likelihood of high engagement based on historical viral content patterns.

content_title.description: Title or main text of the content

content_type.description: Type of content (video, image, text, meme, tutorial, story, challenge)

platform.description: Target platform for viral prediction (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, youtube)

hashtags.description: Hashtags to be used with the content

content_length.description: Content duration or length (short, medium, long)

emotional_tone.description: Emotional tone of content (funny, inspiring, controversial, educational, emotional)

timing_score.description: Timing relevance score for current trends (0-10)

error_messages: Empty content title: Provide a meaningful title or description for analysis.
Invalid content type: Use one of [video, image, text, meme, tutorial, story, challenge].
Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, youtube].
Invalid content length: Use one of [short, medium, long].
Invalid emotional tone: Use one of [funny, inspiring, controversial, educational, emotional, neutral].
Invalid timing score: Must be between 0 and 10.
Invalid visual appeal: Use one of [low, medium, high].
usage: Provide content_title, content_type, and platform. Optionally include hashtags, content_length, emotional_tone, timing_score, and visual_appeal. Returns viral potential analysis and improvement suggestions.

confidence_level.description: Confidence in prediction accuracy (low, medium, high)
